TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DragCompletedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides information about the event that occurs when a user completes a drag operation with the mouse of a control.

Docs.param: The horizontal change in position of the control, resulting from the drag operation.
The vertical change in position of the control, resulting from the drag operation.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag operation was canceled by a call to the method.

Docs.summary: Gets the horizontal change in position of the after the user drags the control with the mouse.
Docs.value: The horizontal difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a control. There is no default value.
